from the novel by Kazuo Ishiguro. It was directed by James Ivory and produced 
by Ismail Merchant, Mike Nichols and John Calley. It starred Anthony Hopkins as 
Stevens and Emma Thompson as Miss Kenton ... The film was nominated for 
eight Academy Awards.
